Things I love about these pants: 100% cotton. Cute. Modest.  Things my daughter loves about these pants: Comfy. Cute. Pockets galore.  These are a good fit following the guide. The length is good. These are so comfy and look super cute on my 11 year old. The tapered look on the leg and the fun pattern, and she loves the big pockets.

I ordered a size up in the hopes that it would be baggy and give some time to grow. Thats exactly what I got. These plants are lightweight and thin. They look just like the picture, but they are by no means warm. They pair well with a lot of things and the fabric on the pockets didn’t shrivel up real bad after the first few washes. My daughter likes the pants because they are lightweight and comfortable. The pants are very stylish and she loves the big pockets. I ordered her regular size and they fit great. They seem to hold their shape so far. The pants seem to be made good.

The Kimoda Cargo Pants for Girls size 13-14 fit great for both my girls. One is 5ft 1.5in and the other is 4ft 9in. They both want to wear these pants and we love the color. We always look for pants with a drawstring however amazingly these pants work well with only just the elastic waist. The fabric is light and comfortable which is most important for both my girls. These pants washed and dried well. They are of great quality, not see-through at all and I’m glad they are finally including pockets in girls pants.
Black and white is the new thing I guess, they are a little big, but she still wears them. She really likes the material also.

I got these for my 11 year old daughter who likes to dress kind of grunge yet comfortable and she loves them. The material is not what I expected but very nice and soft and keeps her cool as well. The pattern and color is exceptional. Fit is spot on as well. She’s happy with them and so am I!

Cute pants, they are definitely baggy but that is partially the style, and my daughter is kind of short lol. They look very cute with a cropped shirt. My daughter loves them! They are nice material, medium heaviness.

I ordered the Kids Girls Drawstring Black Cargo Jogger Pants Casual Girl's Elastic Waist Cargo Pants with Pockets 7-14 Years for my 9-year-old, and they are great. They seem true to size. They don't just look like girl pants to me, because I have some other checkered ones that it ordered for him that look good. I am not big on gender stereotypes, but these do look neutral because of the colors. They are well made, good quality, and comfortable. They aren't really thick or warm like sweatpants material and much thinner. He refers to them as his "colder pants", because they're not a thick, cotton sweatpant material. I think they look classy, and I'm happy with them.

Ordered these for my very picky granddaughter an she loves them. Great for school, every day wear, movies, sport games, ect...
These are good quality pants that fit true to size. The design is unique and the material is sturdy.
